content.text: An Asset Downtime Report provides a summary of Asset Downtime during a defined time period including mean time between failures and mean time to repair. This guide will demonstrate how to generate an Asset Downtime Report.
Navigate to REPORTS > ASSETS > ASSET DOWNTIME
Below are the available report criteria, make the appropriate selections using the drop down menu for each field
Date Range
The time period in which downtime was reported
Date Field
Select between Time Down and Time Up
Asset Selection (optional)
Generate results specific to a particular Asset(s)
Sub Category Selection
Select the Sub Category for the Assets to include in the report
Show Chart
Toggle downtime chart on and off

Select  

The report populates based on selected criteria and is displayed above the report and is now available to be exported:



To change any of the report criteria, select

content.title: Create a Total Cost of Ownership Report

content.text: A Total Cost of Ownership Report provides just that! A total cost of ownership for your assets from maintenance costs and labor, to depreciation and logs. This guide will demonstrate how to generate a Total Cost of Ownership Report.
Navigate to Reports > Assets > Total Cost of Ownership.
Below are the available report criteria, make the appropriate selections using the drop down menu for each field
Group By
Choose whether to group results by Category/Sub Type or Status
Asset Selection (optional)
Generate results specific to a particular Asset(s)
Include Inactive Assets
Select this option to include Inactive Assets in the report
Show Chart
Toggle KPI chart on and off to show a visual representation of costs on the report

Select  

The report populates based on selected criteria and is displayed above the report and is now available to be exported:

content.title: Create an Asset Log Summary Report

content.text: An Asset Log Summary Report provides a snapshot of all the current logs and meter readings for your Assets. This guide will demonstrate how to generate an Asset Log Summary Report.
Navigate to Reports > Assets > Log Summary.
Below are the available report criteria, make the appropriate selections using the drop down menu for each field
Log Types
Select the Log Type to generate report results for
Group By
Select whether to group results by Asset or Log Type
Asset Selection (optional)
Generate results specific to a particular Asset(s)

Select
